name: RandomTwelveNotes
0:
”Alexa open Random Twelve Notes”
”Alexa start Random Twelve Notes”
”Alexa launch Random Twelve Notes”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: random twelve notes
des:
RandomTwelveNotes

Looking for a fun and engaging way to learn and explore the 12 musical notes and have your brain acquire the ability of perfect pitch? Look no further than RandomTwelveNotes!

We believe that sleeping with this skill since born on will make him a composer with perfect pitch skills.

This innovative app plays the 12 main musical notes of a piano in random order and announces the name of each note in English regarding its rank position in a 88 keys piano, helping users to learn, memorize and recognize the sounds of each note.

Whether you're a musician, a music student, or simply someone who loves music, RandomTwelveNotes is a great way to have fun while improving your musical skills.

With its simple and intuitive continuous shuffling mode, you can easily just let it play in the background. So why wait?

Try RandomTwelveNotes today and discover the magic of music!
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
